title: Blocker: Track details missing for download request
description: Instruction to 'try downloading the single track first, and then proceeding with all fixes' lacks track URL/ID/source platform. Cannot proceed without exact track info and intended script/pipeline.

evidence.context: No track specified; only prior active file is Notion DNS blocker stub.
evidence.notion_connectivity_check: curl -I https://api.notion.com/v1/databases -> HTTP/2 401 (token missing, DNS resolves)
